query:
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN source LIKE '%World Bank%' OR source LIKE '%WB%' THEN 'world-bank'
    WHEN source LIKE '%UNHCR%' THEN 'unhcr'
    WHEN source LIKE '%WHO%' THEN 'who-gho'
    WHEN source LIKE '%OCHA%' OR source LIKE '%FTS%' THEN 'ocha-fts'
    WHEN source LIKE '%HDX%' THEN 'hdx'
    WHEN source LIKE '%FEWS%' THEN 'fews-net'
    WHEN source LIKE '%UNICEF%' THEN 'unicef'
    ELSE 'other'
  END as connector_id,
  COUNT(*) as record_count,
  MAX(YEAR(date)) as latest_year
FROM time_series
GROUP BY connector_id
ORDER BY record_count DESC;
